languages.text: {n}Стоило новостям о захватнических настроениях Вольного Торговца достигнуть ушей участников диспута, как обе стороны перешли к поиску компромисса. В итоге через несколько циклов договоренности о совместном обслуживании Горнила все же были достигнуты.{/n}

{n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоило новостям о захватнических настроениях Вольного Торговца достигнуть ушей участников диспута, как обе стороны перешли к поиску компромисса. В итоге через несколько циклов договоренности о совместном обслуживании Горнила все же были достигнуты.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}As soon as the news of the Rogue Trader' s aggressive sentiments have reached the ears of the participants of the dispute, both sides strived to find a compromise. As a result, the agreements were reached after several cycles.{/n}

{n}As soon as the news of the Rogue Trader' s aggressive sentiments have reached the ears of the participants of the dispute, both sides strived to find a compromise. As a result, the agreements were reached after several cycles.{/n}

{n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}

{n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}

{n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}

{n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}

languages.text: {n}行商浪人渴望将熔炉据为己有的决定传到了争论双方耳中。得知这个消息之后，双方一致决定寻求妥协，只花了几个周期就达成了共同维护熔炉的协议。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}行商浪人渴望将熔炉据为己有的决定传到了争论双方耳中。得知这个消息之后，双方一致决定寻求妥协，只花了几个周期就达成了共同维护熔炉的协议。{/n}

languages.text: {n}En cuanto la noticia de la postura beligerante {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente sobre el Crisol llegó a oídos de las partes contendientes, estas decidieron unánimemente empezar a buscar un acuerdo. Solo tardaron varios ciclos en llegar a un acuerdo sobre su mantenimiento colectivo del Crisol.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}En cuanto la noticia de la postura beligerante {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente sobre el Crisol llegó a oídos de las partes contendientes, estas decidieron unánimemente empezar a buscar un acuerdo. Solo tardaron varios ciclos en llegar a un acuerdo sobre su mantenimiento colectivo del Crisol.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ローグトレーダーが坩堝に対して敵対する姿勢を示しているという知らせが論争している当事者の耳に入るやいなや、彼らは全員一致で妥協案を探し始めることにした。坩堝の共同メンテについて合意に達するまで、数サイクルしかかからなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ローグトレーダーが坩堝に対して敵対する姿勢を示しているという知らせが論争している当事者の耳に入るやいなや、彼らは全員一致で妥協案を探し始めることにした。坩堝の共同メンテについて合意に達するまで、数サイクルしかかからなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Dès que les négociateurs apprennent que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a des vues sur le Creuset, il est décidé à l'unanimité qu'un compromis doit être trouvé au plus vite. Il suffit de quelques cycles à peine pour trouver un terrain d'entente et proclamer que la responsabilité du Creuset sera partagée.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Dès que les négociateurs apprennent que {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a des vues sur le Creuset, il est décidé à l'unanimité qu'un compromis doit être trouvé au plus vite. Il suffit de quelques cycles à peine pour trouver un terrain d'entente et proclamer que la responsabilité du Creuset sera partagée.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Sobald die Streithähne vom aggressiven Standpunkt {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} hinsichtlich des Tiegels erfuhren, beschlossen sie einstimmig, nach einer Kompromisslösung zu suchen. Sie brauchten nur wenige Zyklen, um eine Einigung zu finden, wie sich gemeinsam um den Tiegel kümmern konnten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}

Sie brauchten nur wenige Zyklen, um eine Einigung zu finden, wie sich gemeinsam um den Tiegel kümmern konnten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Tartışmalı taraflar, Hür Tacir'in Pota ile alakalı mücadeleci duruşuna dair haberlerin kulaklarına erişmesiyle birlikte oy birliğiyle uzlaşma yolu aramaya karar verdi. Pota'nın ortak bakımına dair bir anlaşmaya varmaları, yalnızca birkaç döngü sürdü.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As soon as news of the Rogue Trader's bellicose stance on the Crucible reached the ears of the disputing sides, they unanimously decided to start looking for a compromise. It only took them several cycles to reach an agreement on their collective maintenance of the Crucible.{/n}
